short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the comment dates on your Friendfeed timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes easier to see when the comment is added. 

This information already exists on FF, but it is hidden behind the speech bubbles and requires a mouseover. Now you can see comment dates easily.
